characteristics: People are divided into "us and them".

characteristics: When combined with hatred, symbols may be forced upon unwilling members of pariah groups...

characteristics: One group denies the humanity of the other group. Members of it are equated with animals, vermin, insects, or diseases.
preventive_measures: Local and international leaders should condemn the use of hate speech and make it culturally unacceptable. Leaders who incite genocide should be banned from international travel and have their foreign finances frozen.

characteristics: Genocide is always organized... Special army units or militias are often trained and armed...

characteristics: Victims are identified and separated out because of their ethnic or religious identity...

characteristics: It is 'extermination' to the killers because they do not believe their victims to be fully human.
preventive_measures: At this stage, only rapid and overwhelming armed intervention can stop genocide. Real safe areas or refugee escape corridors should be established with heavily armed international protection.
